item.title: Recent paper on ChemComm
item.description: Our recently accepted paper in @ChemCommun proposes a novel criterion and then a new protocol for assessment and development of interfacial force fields. Very excited to share it here. https://t.co/9OD4VZeXQO — Le Nhan Pham (@LeNhanPham1) March 1, 2021
